name: Rehana Tabasum
headline: Data Analyst | Turning Data into Actionable Insights
tagline: I am passionate about transforming complex datasets into clear, actionable business insights. Leveraging Python, SQL, and visualization tools like Power BI, I build analytics pipelines, dashboards, and machine learning models that drive strategic decision-making. From cleaning and modeling data to storytelling with impactful visuals, I bridge the gap between raw information and business outcomes, helping organizations make smarter, data-driven decisions.
about_short: I specialize in transforming raw data into clear business stories through analytics, dashboards, and ML-driven insights. Skilled in both backend data wrangling and front-end visualization, I bridge the gap between data and decision-making.
about_long: I am a data analyst dedicated to transforming complex data into actionable insights that drive real business impact. Skilled in Python (pandas, numpy, matplotlib, scikit-learn), SQL, and Power BI, I build end-to-end analytics solutions from data cleaning and modeling to advanced visualization and storytelling dashboards. My work includes anomaly detection pipelines, forecasting models, and executive-ready dashboards that enable leaders to make informed decisions with confidence. I thrive at the intersection of analytics and communication, turning raw data into clear, measurable results.
